title: MAESTRO ERROR!!!
body: If anyone can help me with this please do. I am playing on a mac every time I log in it crashes and says "maestro error". Please help me fix this :(

replies.body: I've been unable to reliably login in for almost a year now on a mac that has a wi-fi connection, despite investing in a very nice wireless router and working with Riot support staff.   What's more frustrating is that if I do manage to login, I enjoy stable, responsive gameplay with no issues whatsoever; there is just some kind of check that is occurring during the login process that causes the game to crash.

The maestro error can happen when your network can't connect to our servers.  This can cause problems like leaving you behind in champion select, or fail to group you with other players.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  Make sure to use the mac instructions!  Let me know if you have any questions!
